flavors.description: Creamy Vanilla Fresh Frozen Custard swirled with ribbons of peanut butter and old fashioned salted caramel and loaded with novelty chocolate.
Double up on deliciousness with Caramel Fresh Frozen Custard swirled with toasted pecan pieces and novelty chocolate.
Our creamy Vanilla and Chocolate Fresh Frozen Custard swirled together and mixed with thick fudge, ribbons of old fashioned salted caramel and cookie dough pieces.
A rich, indulgent cookie dough treat with ribbons of old fashioned salted caramel and thick fudge swirled in creamy Vanilla Fresh Frozen Custard.
Culver's Classic! This one still knocks our socks off. Specially blended Butter Pecan Fresh Frozen Custard with toasted pecan pieces.
Our specially blended Strawberry Fresh Frozen Custard swirled with plump strawberries.
A mint flavored custard with dark chocolate chunks
Extra dark chocolate frozen custard, smooth caramel topping, Reese's peanut butter topping, chocolate chip cookie dough chunks
Ripples of fudge and roasted almonds blended into a light mocha custard.
Ripples of fudge and roasted almonds blended into a light mocha custard.
A burgundy cherry custard mixed with real burgundy cherries!
